At a industry event here, Sergio Marchionne three times referred to the`` shyster'' loans that the U.S. and Canadian governments made to save Chrysler in 2009. I want to pay back the shyster loans, Sergio Marchionne said Friday.`` When we did this deal back in 2009, we couldn't have borrowed a buck from a 7-Eleven store. The banking system was shut.''
